title: Not Sent
description: The direct-marketing metric `not-sent` describes the number of asynchronous messages (email, SMS, MMS etc) that have not been dispatched to an recipient's account/address/device due to cancellation or expiration of the marketing activity.

@id.description: The unique identifier of this metric.

schema:name.description: The human-readable name of the metric. The name can be used in user interfaces and does not have to be unique.

xdm:measurement.description: How to take measures of this metric.
